de.fhg.iml.vlog.xfvrp.opt
Class XFVRPOptBase

java.lang.Object
  de.fhg.iml.vlog.xfvrp.base.XFVRPBase<XFVRPModel>
      de.fhg.iml.vlog.xfvrp.opt.XFVRPOptBase
Direct Known Subclasses:
UNFINISHED_XFVRPCheapestInsert, XFVRPConst, XFVRPILS, XFVRPOptImpBase, XFVRPSavings, XFVRPSlowSavings, XFVRPSolomonI1, XFVRPSweep
public abstract class XFVRPOptBase
extends XFVRPBase<XFVRPModel>

This class contains utility methods for all extending classes. There are methods for changing a solution (giant tour) like move, swap or relocate and evaluating a solution by simulating the route plan node by node (Lineare evaluation time). All classes inheriting this class have access to an instance of XFVRPModel.

Author:
hschneid

Method Detail

check

public Quality check(Node[] giantTour,
                     Vehicle vehicle,
                     int start,
                     int end,
                     TourQuality[] tqArr,
                     Quality fullQuality,
                     boolean update,
                     boolean withDelta)
Evaluates the costs and validates the restrictions of the given giant tour. The costs are equal to the driven distance. The giant tour contains several tours, which are connected to a long sequence. The end depot of a tour is equal to the start depot of the following tour. The first and the last node of the giant tour has to be a depot. The restrictions are the maximal capacity of the vehicle and the maximal allowed length of a tour. This check method allows accelerated evaluation. The range for the simulation loop can be limited by the values in start and end. For these the surrounding depots are searched and the simulation process is started in the range of these surrounding depots. In addition for each segment of the giant tour, which is equal to tour, a tour quality is generated, which will be added by a delta function to the current solution quality.

Parameters:
giantTour - sequence of nodes
vehicle - Vehicle type which contains the controlling and restriction parameters
start - starting index of evaluation
end - ending index of evaluation
tqArr - List of tour qualities of the current solution
fullQuality - current solution quality
update - switch to activate the adding of tour qualities to the current quality (default false)
withDelta - switch to activate the acceleration (default true)
Returns:
the quality of the given giant tour

check

public Quality check(Node[] giantTour,
                     Vehicle vehicle)
Processes a full check without acceleration and delta calculation.

Parameters:
giantTour - sequence of nodes
